definition: to be capable of/to be able to/can
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
enough (sufficient)/enough (too much)/(coll.) (before adj.) really/(coll.) to reach by stretching out
avid/eager for/longing for/to look forward to

sentences.english: Thellonking is one of the most productive activities a human being can undertake.
sentences.chinese: 念考是此中最出產性活動己的總稱能夠舉行。

sentences.english: Text analysis is the process of enabling computers to extract meaning from text.
sentences.chinese: 文本分析是指使計算機能夠從文本中提取意義的過程。

sentences.english: Here is a list of what it will include.
sentences.chinese: 以下是它所能夠包含的新特性列表。

sentences.english: Your intended recipients will be able to unscramble it with ease.
sentences.chinese: 您預期的收件人將能夠輕鬆地解讀它。

sentences.english: If time is not pressing, sieges or neutralization will be likely options of choice.
sentences.chinese: 假按時分沒有平靜，也能夠或許選擇圍攻或水力壓抑。

sentences.english: They also can be able to re-edit the post even after posting it.
sentences.chinese: 他們還可以能夠重新編輯，即使它張貼的職位。

sentences.english: As you can see, as long as the initial value is above zero, this function will terminate.
sentences.chinese: 可見，只要初始值大於零，這個函數就能夠終止。

sentences.english: An elephant can uproot a tree or pick a flower without bruising a petal.
sentences.chinese: 大象能夠拔起大樹，或者摘下小花而不損傷花瓣。

sentences.english: The fact that you have control over all the clients helps.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，你能夠控制所有客戶的話是很有幫助的。

sentences.english: The additional night's stay can help increase ancillary spending.
sentences.chinese: 加夜逗留能夠幫助增加輔助消費。

sentences.english: I can certainly picture being ill.
sentences.chinese: 我肯定能夠想象自己生病。

sentences.english: The only thing one can write that is a bit serious—a love letter.
sentences.chinese: 唯一我們能夠寫的就是一板正經的情書。

sentences.english: I could literally count the patches on the ripstop nylon.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至能夠精確地數清防刮尼龍傘上的補丁。

sentences.english: Finally a word on Burnley, did last night prove they will be no pushovers this season?
sentences.chinese: 最後說說伯恩利，昨晚證明他們本賽季能夠保級嗎？

sentences.english: There, I've said it -- it feels so good to have that off my chest.
sentences.chinese: 在此，我已經說過能夠脫離開書架讓我感覺非常好。

sentences.english: The room ha great importould like closet. You can put your totes in it.
sentences.chinese: 房間裏有一個很大的壁櫥，你能夠把你的行李放出來。

definition: to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
